section.heading: Dyed special fuel use—Authorization, license required—Imposition of tax

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.38 > Section 82.38.065 82.38.060 << 82.38.065 >> 82.38.066 PDF RCW 82.38.065 Dyed special fuel use — Authorization, license required — Imposition of tax. A person may operate or maintain a licensed or required to be licensed motor vehicle with dyed special fuel in the fuel supply tank only if the use is authorized by the internal revenue code and the person is either the holder of a dyed special fuel user license or the use is exempt from the special fuel tax. A person may maintain dyed special fuel for a taxable use in bulk storage if the person is the holder of a dyed special fuel user license issued under this chapter. [ 2013 c 225 s 108 ; 2002 c 183 s 3 ; 1998 c 176 s 56 .] NOTES: Effective date — 2013 c 225: See note following RCW 82.38.010 .
